manifestExtensionDescription.message: Easily create tab loadouts, which will open several links in different tabs with a simple keyboard shortcut

editSaveButtonTitle.message: Save current tabs as new loadout in the selected slot

editOverwriteButtonTitle.message: Overwrite loadout in the selected slot with current tabs

editExportPrompt.message:
Export all tab loadouts to a folder under Other Bookmarks
Specify the folder name:
